item.description:
Hey Guys -
So, Rock to Rock is a wonderful event in New Haven - a bike ride from West Rock to East Rock in celebration of Earth Day and a fundraising benefit for several great organizations in the city.

I didn't get a chance to do it last year, so this year I'm being a little more proactive and forming my own "team" Team "New Haven Climbers"

So... two things,
First, you should come to the event and ride with us. It'll be totally fun.
Second, you should join the team and make a small donation in addition to the $25.00 registration fee. Remember, its for a good cause...

The ride itself is a leisurely 8 miles, with optional rides up to the tops of both East and West Rock. Along the route there are stops at many of New Haven's parks for food, music, and fun.

So... to sign up go here: http://www.rocktorock... and click on the button to register today. There's also a bunch more detailed information up there, so check it out.

Please join our team and donate. On the registration page which comes up, click on "join a team" - There is a fee of $25 ($15 for 18 and under) to join in on the event. Once you go through the whole registration thing - JOIN OUR TEAM - I think it will either be called "New Haven Rock Climbers" or under my name "Daniel Jeanette." I know, I know... registration fee and I'm asking for more donation money... suck it up. Giving $5 isn't going to kill ya, that's like one beer for a good cause. DONATE!!!

Alternatively, if you can't make the event you should DONATE by visiting this page: http://www.firstgivin...

So - there - bike ride, fun, food, music, benefit for a good cause... what more could you want. I'm still waiting to hear back on this, but there is a very good possibility that they will have bikes available for rent at the event. I'll post an update when I have it.
item.how_to_find_us: Hmm... I'll be the guy with the bike! hah. No, call my cell if you need help finding me: 203-687-6864. I'll try to make myself noticeable.
item.name: Rock to Rock Earth Day Bike Ride
